summary: Hiring qualified and trustworthy people as efficiently as possible is critical to meeting the Department of Homeland Security's needs. DHS must vet candidates in a timely manner, including ensuring that candidates have completed all hiring requirements, such as medical exams, and verifying that paperwork is complete and accurate. title: DHS Hiring: Additional Actions Needed to Enhance Vetting Processes Across the Department
